FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help.

q1.question: How do I receive my credentials?
q1.answer: Your credentials will be sent to your email and displayed on your dashboard immediately after payment confirmation.

q2.question: Can I use the service on multiple devices?
q2.answer: Yes, our plans support multiple devices. The 1-year plan allows up to 2 simultaneous connections.

q3.question: Do you offer a refund?
q3.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee if you are not satisfied with our service.

q4.question: What internet speed do I need?
q4.answer: We recommend a minimum of 10 Mbps for HD content and 25 Mbps for 4K content.

q5.question: Do you have adult channels?
q5.answer: Yes, we have a wide selection of adult channels which can be password protected.
